data.title: Film Forum · Francis Ford Coppola’sTHE GODFATHER PART II
data.meta_description:
Francis Ford Coppola’s
GODFATHER TRILOGY

THE GODFATHER PART II
Friday, April 19 3:40
(1974) Prequel and sequel to the original, as Pacino’s Michael consolidates his empire after dabbling in Cuban futures and vets the family for weaklings, while Oscar-winner Robert De Niro, as the young Godfather-to-be, takes on the bosses of turn-of-the-20th-century Little Italy. DCP. Approx. 202 min.
